name: Radisson Blu Media Harbour Hotel, Dusseldorf

reviews.text: Very nice hotel. The rooms are nicely designed and well equiped. The service was exelent and the staff very friendly. Very nice neighborhood.
reviews.title: Super modern und guter service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very recommendable.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: Excellent hotel in every way. All staff so friendly and attentive - especially reception staff. Nothing was too much trouble. Location beside the Rhine and Sky Tower ideal for a relaxing break away - yet within walking distance of Aldstat for a livelier holiday.
reviews.title: Great Business Hotel in the Media Harbour Area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have stayed a couple of times here, maily due to its proximity to the offices in the media harbour. But it is a good place to stay in any case - stylish, and a very good value for money. Rooms are good, resonably spacious, modern, clean. Great beds. The restaurant ist so-so, best bet is to go out in the evening and check our one of the many dining places within walking distance.
reviews.title: Fantastic, could not have asked for more!

reviews.text: Staff is very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Very good hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here for one night recently and nice contemporary hotel in very nice district of Dusseldorf. There are some superb restaurants nearby and the service here is good with very nice breakfast. It is close to Rhine and you I find it nice to walk down rthe Rhione to my workplace in the morining. For those who like to exercise there is plenty of company with nice pedestrianised path along the Rhine.
reviews.title: Nice Location with good restaurants and Rhine Nearby

reviews.text: This modern designed hotel offers nice rooms, ver good service, friendly staff and is especially very good located in the in-location in Duesseldorf - the media harbour. Excellent for everybody who woulkd like to do some party and see something from Duesseldorf.
reviews.title: Very nice, modern hotel in excellent location
Highly recommendable
reviews.text: Modern equipped rooms with flat tv.
Just enjoy it.
reviews.title: Great hotel - super location

reviews.text: The Radisson Blu Media Harbour Hotel is located within the Medienhafen district of Dusseldorf, one of the in-fashion areas within the cities. It is surrounded by many places where one can have food and drinks. The rooms are clean and nice, it's a designer hotel. You get a free bottle of water every day. There is a fitness room with a sauna which is good. Breakfast is very good, coffee tastes great and they offer free freshly squeezed orange juice which is delicious. Prices are about 120 Euros plus.
reviews.title: Good Business Hotel in the Media Harbour Area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here a couple of weeks ago with my partner.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: We loved the hotel - nice design, a heavenly bed, very good breakfast, friendly and helpful staff, good location with lots of restaurants and bars in the vicinity. 10 mins. taxi drive to the city centre, cost 8 euro taxi drive. We would recommend the hotel and will definitely stay here again next time visiting Dusseldorf.
reviews.title: Great allround hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in a great location, right on the Marina, surrounded by trendy restaurants and casual bars. The hotel is very modern and trendy and the staff very helpful and friendly. Everything you need from a hotel with free internet and good breakfast (though at Euro 24). Eur 10 to the railway station, and Eur 20 to the airport. Right next to Rheinturm.
reviews.title: one of the best hotels

reviews.text: Great location, good service, beautiful design and a nice ambience. This is one of the best hotels I've stayed in. The service is very good and the staff helpfull.The rooms are not very big however they are equiped with the necassaries. The Rhine is a 5 minute walk from the hotel and is enjoyable for a stroll with great views. The breakfast is amazing and there is always friendly staff available to assist you with everything you need. There are good restaurants and a cinema located within walking distance. I had a very pleasant 3 days stay. This hotel is perfect for city trips.
reviews.title: Wow! What a hotel

reviews.text: I can't express enough how I much I loved this hotel. Simply perfect! The breakfast was a very special experience with a great selection of coffees and teas. And I am very picky of coffee and tea should be made but these were perfect. I really liked the small but very clean gym. The hotel makes you feel luxurious and cozy at the same time. Good location and helpful staff.
reviews.title: Great hotel. Perfect location!

reviews.text: Clean rooms, comfortable and helpful staff. The parking is immediately adjacent to the hotel, you just go down a level. The rates were reasonable, and the room was "roomy" including free wifi. Easy walking distance to Meerbar Dusseldorf, a neighborhood favorite.
reviews.title: Close to dining and convenient parking

reviews.text: modern and stylish hotel, rooms are also new designed and nice, upper class atmosphere,
reviews.title: Very good hotel in a nice area with a lot of restaurants and bars

reviews.text: Don't expect a bustling bar downstairs or any kind of socialising, but it's just the perfect comfortable, friendly business hotel. Everything was clean, the staff were really helpful and we were being a bit of a drain on them during our trip.
reviews.title: As a practical business hotel, excellent

reviews.text: My favourite touch, which is fairly pointless in reality was that there was a section of the glass between the (excellent) shower room that was not frosted, so you could see the television whilst in the shower.
reviews.title: good for a business trip

reviews.text: This is a very pleasant, simple hotel with comfortable well equipped rooms. The staff are really friendly and speak excellent English. Wi-fi was a bit slow but it was effective and it was free, at least in the slightly more pricey business class rooms on the upper floors.
reviews.title: Modern hotel and different; very nice

aka: Radisson Blu Media Harbour Hotel, Dusseldorf Hotel
